heading: email hate scribe sentenced
subheading: the first person convicted of civil rights violations in connection with cyberspace received time served and was ordered to undergo counseling.
author: wired news report
text: a college failure in a series of email messages written under the alias "asian hater," machado, a naturalized citizen from el salvador, threatened to hunt down and kill asians at the university of california, irvine, whose student body is nearly half asian.machado told the court in february that he resented asians because many were academically successful. he'd been kicked out of uc irvine because of bad grades.a judge in santa ana, california, ordered him to serve a year of supervised release, undergo psychiatric counseling, and receive tolerance training.
